import React from 'react' import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const EachProduct = ({ products }) => { const { tag } = useParams() console.log(products) return (

Back to Shop

{products.filter(product => product.tag === tag).map(product => (

{product.title}

{product.price}

{product.info}

))}
) } export default EachProduct
